courses.advice_detail_en: It is quite cold. Long sleeves, tights, and a windproof jacket are recommended. Moderate wind. It may feel a bit cooler than the actual temperature. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is moderate. Consider a mask if you are sensitive to fine dust. Extra cautions: Night caution. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
